class.name: bt_actions::NavigateAction
class.description: Navigate to a pose using Nav2 NavigateToPose action.

class.name: bt_actions::TakePhotoAction
class.description: Capture an image from a camera topic and store it on the blackboard.

class.name: bt_actions::DetectTreeCondition
class.description: Condition node checking for detected trees exceeding a confidence threshold.

class.name: bt_actions::ExploreFieldAction
class.description: Execute a field exploration by following waypoints.
